title: "🗓️ Week 11 -Getting soil data properties"

In this week, we will learn about *SoilGrids*, a global dataset of soil properties obtained using soil data and machine learning techniques. In addition, we will learn how to download such data for a particular area of interest.

## 👨‍🏫 SoilGrids web portal 

[SoilGrids250m 2.0 - A system for digital soil mapping based on global compilation of soil profile data and environmental layers.](https://soilgrids.org/)

## R Practical

Replicate the [SoilGrids notebook](https://rpubs.com/ials2un/downloadSoilGrids) for your department.  Bring the downloaded data to the classroom on 25th June.

## Useful references:

[SoilGrids 2.0: producing soil information for the globe with quantified spatial uncertainty](https://soil.copernicus.org/articles/7/217/2021/)
